de.esoco.lib.security

Class SecurityRelationTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.lib.security.SecurityRelationTypes

  • public class SecurityRelationTypes
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains security-related relation types.

        A login name for authentication purposes.

        A string token describing the authentication method to apply.

        An authentication password.

      • CREDENTIAL

        An authentication credential in text form (e.g. the text representation of a certificate).

      • ALIAS

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> ALIAS
        An alias name for a cryptographic element.

      • BINARY_CREDENTIAL

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<byte[]> BINARY_CREDENTIAL
        An authentication credential in binary form (e.g. the binary representation of a certificate).

      • CA_CERTIFICATE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<byte[]> CA_CERTIFICATE
        The certificate of a certificate authority. For typical usage the data should be in a format that can be processed by CertificateFactory.generateCertificate(java.io.InputStream).

      • CA_PRIVATE_KEY

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<byte[]> CA_PRIVATE_KEY
        The private key for the certificate of a certificate authority. For typical usage the data should be in PKCS8 format that can be handed to PKCS8EncodedKeySpec.

      • AUTHENTICATION_SERVICE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<AuthenticationService> AUTHENTICATION_SERVICE
        A reference to an AuthenticationService.

      • CERTIFICATE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.security.KeyStore> CERTIFICATE
        A Java security key store that holds a cryptographic certificate and the corresponding private key. The alias under which the certificate will be available depends on the application. The class Security contains some predefined alias names, e.g. Security.ALIAS_SERVER_CERT.

      • SIGNING_CERTIFICATE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.security.KeyStore> SIGNING_CERTIFICATE
        A Java security key store that holds a cryptographic certificate and the corresponding private key for the signing of other certificates. The signing certificate must me stored under the alias Security.ALIAS_SIGNING_CERT.

      • KEY_PAIR

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.security.KeyPair> KEY_PAIR
        A pair of public and private key for asymmetric cryptography.

      • KEY_SIZE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Integer> KEY_SIZE
        The size of a cryptographic key.

      • KEY_PASSWORD

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> KEY_PASSWORD
        The password for a cryptographic key.

      • KEY_ALGORITHM

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> KEY_ALGORITHM
        The algorithm for the creation of a cryptographic key. Defaults to 'RSA'.

      • CERTIFICATE_ALGORITHM

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> CERTIFICATE_ALGORITHM
        The algorithm for the creation of a cryptographic certificate. Defaults to 'SHA256withRSA'.

      • CERTIFICATE_ISSUER

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> CERTIFICATE_ISSUER
        The issuer of a cryptographic certificate in standard string form (like 'CN=<CommonName>, O=<Organization>,...'.

      • CERTIFICATE_VALIDITY

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Integer> CERTIFICATE_VALIDITY
        The validity of a cryptographic certificate in days.

      • COMMON_NAME

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> COMMON_NAME
        The common name of a cryptographic certificate.

      • ORGANIZATION

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> ORGANIZATION
        The organization name of a cryptographic certificate. Defaults to an empty string.

      • ORGANIZATION_UNIT

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> ORGANIZATION_UNIT
        The organization unit of a cryptographic certificate. Defaults to an empty string.

      • LOCALITY

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> LOCALITY
        The locality name (typically a city name) of a cryptographic certificate. Defaults to an empty string.

      • STATE_PROVINCE_REGION

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> STATE_PROVINCE_REGION
        The state, province, or region name of a cryptographic certificate. Defaults to an empty string.

      • COUNTRY

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> COUNTRY
        The country name of a cryptographic certificate. Defaults to an empty string.
